text: Rail transport in Austria is mainly owned by the national rail company Ã–BB. The railway network consists of 6,123 km, its gauge is and 3,523 km are electrified. There are some funiculars, rack railways and a lot of heritage railways mainly on disused lines. Some secondary lines are set up in narrow gauge. Austria is a member of the International Union of Railways (UIC). The UIC Country Code for Austria is 81. ==References==
title: Rail transport in Austria
